message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm asking for $16,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I believe I can't justify spending $16,000 on it. Could we discuss a price closer to my budget, around $10,000?

Hi Bob, thanks for your counter-offer. I see where you're coming from, but $10,000 is significantly below my bottom line.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? This price reflects the true value of the product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. While I understand the value of the product, I still feel that $13,000 is beyond my budget. Could we try $12,000 instead?
